sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SANTAREN, a handſome town of Portugal in Eſtremadura, ſeated on a mountain near the river Tajo, in a country very fertile in wheat, wine, and oil. They get in their harveſt here two months after they have ſown their corn. It was taken from the Moors in 1447. W. Long. 7. 45. N. Lat. 39. 12.
